DOC.brief_summary: Otherwise healthy subject currently bein maintain either methadone buprenorphine/naloxone opioid maintenance therapy stable dose least 30 day administer BI 201335 daily determine drug interaction occur BI 201335 either methadone buprenorphine/naloxone .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With BI 201335 Methadone Buprenorphine/Naloxone
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1. stable dose either methadone buprenorphine/naloxone 30 day opioid maintenance therapy . 2 . Male female volunteer body mass index ( BMI ) = 18.5 < 32 minimum weight 50kg . Exclusion criterion : 1. significant medical illness clinical significance . 2. history rash photosensitivity 3. chronic acute infection include HIV , hepatitis B hepatitis C. 4. history allergy consider significant study 5. intake medication except methadone buprenorphine/naloxone . 6 . QTc electrocardiogram ( ECG ) > 470 . 7. use investigational drug within 30 day study . 8. drug alcohol abuse ( define opioid maintenance therapy either methadone buprenorphine/naloxone ) 9. blood donation 100mL within four week trial . 10. excessive physical activity one week prior trial . 11. clinically relevant laboratory value . 12. concomitant use food product know alter P450 Pgp activity grapefruit juice , seville orange St. John 's Wort . 13. inadequate venous access For woman childbearing potential : 14. pregnancy plan become pregnant within 3 month trial 15. positive pregnancy test screen visit 16. proof sterilization unwilling unable use double barrier method birth control study 3 month study . 17. lactation active breastfeeding screen 30 day last study visit .
